messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] suggestion for an unschooler
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/17/2004 6:37:40 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/17/2004 6:37:40 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "freelance_trance"
<infiniteclay@e...> wrote:
> Hello. My name is David, a 16 year old unschooler. First time
posting
> here, as well. =) Hello!<<<

David, there have been several teens writing here lately. Y'all really might
want to start your own yahoo group: like teenunschooler@yahoogroups.com

There just seems to have been a surge in teens wanting to take control of
their lives lately. Maybe y'all could trade ideas.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
